General.Name: Cuprum
General.Description: Administradora de Fondos de Pensiones Cuprum S.A. is a publicly owned investment manager. The firm manages mutual funds and equity for its clients. It invests in domestic and foreign stock and bonds. It was founded in December 29, 2014 and is based in Santiago, Chile. Administradora de Fondos de Pensiones Cuprum S.A. operates as a subsidiary of Principal Chile Ltda.
